sql.create_images:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS images (

    path    TEXT not null,
    file    TEXT not null,
    thumb   TEXT,
    display TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (path,file)
)
sql.create_meta:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS meta (
    path    TEXT not null,
    file    TEXT not null,
    exif    TEXT,
    iptc    TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (path,file))
sql.create_dir_list:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sfpg_dir (
    path        TEXT,
    dirDirs     INTEGER,    -- No of subdirs
    dirImages   INTEGER,    -- No of images in current dir
    dirFiles    INTEGER,    -- No of files in current dir
    dirTime     INTEGER,    -- Timestamp
    dirThumb    BLOB,       -- Thumbnail for directory
}
sql.insert_files: INSERT OR IGNORE INTO %s( path, file ) VALUES( '%s','%s' );
sql.replace_into_images: REPLACE INTO images( path, file, thumb, display ) VALUES( '%s', '%s', '%s' , '%s');
sql.replace_into_meta: REPLACE INTO meta( path, file, exif, iptc ) VALUES( '%s', '%s', '%s' , '%s');
